Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Excellent food in the heart of Amsterdam, incredible friendly staff that calls you by your name; cool and soft ambience. Super tasty food, the kind of food you know it's made with a lot of  effort and kindness.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text:
Great food and customer service. It‚Äôs located so close to the Amsterdam Centraal Station so we had our last lunch there in Amsterdam before taking the train back home. Their Ayam Kremes & Ayam Woku tasted authentic.
We only wished that they opened earlier so we could have an early lunch üòÅ

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text:
My first indonesian restaurant, very good experience.
Their friendly welcome ü§ó, flavors and smells, presentation,  quantity, not so hot üå∂, prices, everything‚Äôs good üëåüèª

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Delicious! It was worth the money! The sauce is really tasty! The background is well-decorated, we had a great time there!

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Came from California with my friends and I to the Netherlands, and the hospitality from the jump was amazing he immediately welcomed us and offered tea and even remembered my 3 other friends name who came a week earlier! The food is amazing ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Indonesian restaurant in the Nieuw Market area. Jerry is a very friendly guy. He will ask your name and will not forget no matter how busy the restaurant is. The "must" at the house is the Rijsttafel with two different options. A ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: I had the Rice Table Aneka and it was delicious.  I never knew green beans could taste so good - those are the first I've ever actually enjoyed!

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: We were on a week long river cruise up the Rhine river and our Indonesian waitress on the boat say this is her favorite restaurant in Amsterdam. ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text:
Authentic casual restaurant with quirky service.

We visited with a baby and were accommodated and made to feel welcome.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: One of the most tastiest Indonesian food cuisine, being served by Chef‚Äôs husband itself, all are perfect!!! Cook with love‚Ä¶Highly recommended!

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text:
This restaurant is worth 5h30 drive from Paris!
Food is excellent, exactly as how I remember it back home in Indonesia. Jerry is such a warm and welcoming personality to meet. He would ask your name and ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text:
I'm postively stumped, after buying takeaway from here just half hour ago.
1. Customer service was top notch. The guy addressed me by first name from start of order to delivery. I was also offered tea and a snack during my wait. ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text:
Great food but the customer care is next level!
What a pleasant experience.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: We spent a lovely diner here. Jerry was very kind and considerate. The food was delicious, served in a short time and not expensive. It is a must try when look for an Indonesian restaurant in Amsterdam. We‚Äôll definitely return in the future üòä.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Best Indonesian food I‚Äôve ever had. Amazing service as well

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Nice, delicous, authentic and marvelous meal. Very nice and attentive service. Recommended.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Stopped in here on a Saturday evening for dinner and was happy to find plenty of open seating. I absolutely love Indonesian food and was not disappointed with the meat dishes that were served. The vindaloo beef, satay chicken and spicy egg ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: We really like it. We had the multi-dish (non-vegan) option and every single dish was delicious. My favorite dishes were the satay chicken and the spicy beef - if we go back to Amsterdam I will get one of those alone. Our host, Gery ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Great place for Indonesian Rijsttafel with prompt service and nice veg and non veg options.  Very reasonably priced. Accommodating for our large group!

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: We were looking for something different that evening & were happy that the staff found a table for us (it was a midweek & they were moderately busy). We loved the selection of food & portions had a perfect size to satisfy 2 people. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Excellent rijstaffel (apologies for my spelling). Friendly service, very tasty dishes. Nice beer... What more could a hungry tourist want?

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Nicest people here that gave me some tea to warm me up while I was waiting for my food, the food itself was delicious I really recommend the Daging Balado if you like spicy food !

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: If not for the wait to find a table, which was already free and had to be cleaned to accommodate me, the restaurant is really good for food. It's good for a fixed menu option, if you're going for ala carte, you're not going to have as many ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text:
Excellent food. Great service.

We will be back

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text:
Friendly Staff!
Heavenly food! Must try when coming to Amsterdam. It's a selection of 10 dishes or so. Their rice cakes with the peanut butter sauce are to die for. Totally recommended

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Delicious Indonesian cuisine, but not as spicy as I expected. There are vegetarian options available. The service is efficient and friendly enough, but do come early for lunch because it seems that there is always a queue.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Rijsttafel! Rijsttafel! Rijsttafel! I've never had Indonesian food before, but what we got was SO delicious. Got the set menu (around ‚Ç¨20 pp) and we had more food than we knew what to do with and EVERYTHING was delicious. It was also close to the station, so we had a wonderful meal AND made our train.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: I love the food and the kindness of the personnel! The owner made us feel special! üòä

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text:
For you who misses Indonesian Food like at home, you should come to Aneka Rasa. You will be welcomed warmly :D
So recommended !!!

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Very nice owners, so polite and friendly. Even made the effort to ask us for our names and remembered them. This was our 1st experience with the Indonesian Cuisine. It wss a very positive one, it tasted very well. Price was very good, i paid for drinks and food around 20‚Ç¨. Will definitely return once I visit Amsterdam again.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Great food and service. Try set for A few people, U will taste A lot of dishes.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Never had a rice table meal so decided to try it here. It was great, except a little too spicy for my husband so he limited himself to the non-spicy stuff. We gave everything a try and I loved all the flavors. Staff was welcoming and ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: The recommendations for this restaurant were appealing but it was closed when we arrived.  Too bad...they're supposed to be the best Indonesian restaurant in Amsterdam.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Definitely would dine here again. Excellent food!

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Tried the ayam rujak and it was super tasty! Great service too, and they have amazing deals now!

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: I came here to eat with a couple of friends because we needed to wind down after a hard day's work. We fancied a rice table and picked this one because it was so close to central station and easy to meet everyone. We ordered the vegetarian ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: What a great hidden gem in Amsterdam! The set meal was fantastic and included so many different options to try. I came as a single and although the menu is for two people they catered for me brilliantly by just sending out a single portion ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Situated centrally. Very friendly, multilingual, unobtrusive staff, excellent service. We had the vegetarian menu, which consisted of fourteen different dishes, every one utterly delicious - from delicately spicy and fragrant to rich and satisfying. I‚Äòd definitely go back for more!

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Great food, quick and friendly service, and super clean toilets. Get yourself a vegetarian ‚Äòrice plate‚Äô, sit back and enjoy the food belly.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Friendly staff and cozy dining place. The cusine is good and drinks have many choices.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Highly recommended, for a good authentic Indonesian rice-table at an affordable price. The rice-table comes in two choices, either with meat, or vegetarian. ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Not having had Indonesian food before I don't have a direct comparison; however, The food was excellent. There was a wide array of dishes with the per person meals. Everything was delicious. Atmosphere is nice. Highly recommended.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Delicious, tasty Indonesian food!!! Similar to Malaysian cuisine. They prefer reservations but walking in you may have to wait a bit. 2 menus vegetarian or non vegetarian served tapas style. We got non vegetarian. Various meats & veggies ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Indonesian restaurant with a simple and comfortable atmosphere. The food tastes great.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: The food was excellent. The only item that kept this from being a 5 star review was the amount of staff on shift. There were 2 girls running the entire restaurant, who did a great job, but the owner needs more members on the team to take care of the amount of customers. My wife loved the variety of food offered with our order.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text:
Incredible !!
The chef reminds our names and the dishes are d√©licious.. a service so kind and delicate !! A very beautiful exp√©rience

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Delicious! I grew up on Indonesian food and this was great. Their specialty is Rijsttafel, essentially a Tour of Indonesian Food. If you have never had Indonesian food, this is the place to try it. Indonesian food is along the lines of Thai ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Can not recommend this place enough. We had to wait half an hour for a table (we were a party of nine so not a big issue at all). But as the place was so busy that was a good sign. We ordered the rice table, there was a perfect amount of ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: The restaurant was quiet was we went just after opening. The waiter was very good, polite and more than happy to explain the food we were ordering as we had never eaten it before. The food arrived quickly and was genuenly amazing, I just wish there was more.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Food quality of the Rice taffle was underwhelming for 20 euros. Service was also just OK, had to ask the waiter two times for my drink since she forgot the order, and two times for the bill since she forgot. ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Great indo food. Good portion. So full of flavour

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: They provide different dishes, coming in small portions. Two options, vegetarian and non vegetarian were on the menu. We went for the non vegetarian one and it was really delicious. Also the dessert is included in the menu.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text:
Excellent food. Fantastic variety of dishes for a reasonable price.
Service was a bit patchy but not terrible: we had quite a wait for the bill and again to actually pay but the staff were very friendly and wrll-informed about the menu.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: One of my favourite restaurants for Indonesian food.  For 20 EUR each you'll get a good spread of dishes on the set menu. Very central, friendly service.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Really tasty food reasonably priced with a fast and friendly staff. I had a thoroughly good time.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: As I'm writing this review, my stomach is grumbling early carving another helping of Aneka Rasa!  First, do not eat here alone, the portions are enormous; they could feed a group of three.  Next, try the "Aneka" platter it was scrumptious, ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: An excellent assortment of Indonesian dishes that give a great sample of that country's culinary highlights. ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Very good food and very nice people there ‚ò∫Ô∏è We'll visit again

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text:
This was my first experience of Indonesian food and I loved it!

If you're in the same situation, I strongly recommend this place as you can try ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Very nice spot in this dense area. The food was great and the tasting menus are amazing to try out different things that you know or don't know. The Aneka menu was the best, with so many different kinds of meat and sauce. The staff was very friendly and spoke English.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: The waitress's opening gambit of 'we're short staffed, service might not be good' didn't bode well. In the end service wasn't the problem. We had the Aneka Rice table. The food was just disappointing. The vegetable dishes were very bland. ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text:
If it's Indonesian food your after, this is the place.
Really good authentic food, pleasant surroundings and friendly people.
About ‚Ç¨21 per head. ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: This was an enjoyable evening meal; the food had great flavors but I found the spiciest dishes were a little under spiced for my taste. That said, we will be happy to return for another meal the next time we are in town.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: We left this restaurant without eating because we were not allowed to order just appetizers. We were a group of four and two people wanted the set menu( a variety of small dishes) , and the other two wanted to order a couple of appetizers. ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Always looking for good indonesian food in Amsterdam. I ended up getting a Chicken Satay which was very good. For my main course I got some other chicken dish. It was decent, but nothing to write home about. The prices are also very high here.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: This wasn't my first neither the last time I was in this restaurant. The staff is really nice they speak English well and helpful. The food is tasty and the portions are big. They have Indonesian beer called "Bitang" which is a bit sweet compare to other lagers but I like it.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: OK rijsttafel, and slightly pricey at 29 euros for the more premium set menu. We came away feeling full, the food was satisfying, but not outstanding. I've had other rijsttafel in Amsterdam, some at similar price range, and this was not the best I've had.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Love the food here, vegetarian rijstaffel is absolutely delicious!

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: We ordered the "aneka" rice table and it was good. However, the tastes always lingered on the sweeter note which I find it difficult when you want to put Indonesian platter. ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Great great food.  It was in our travel book by Rick Steve's.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Two set menu options, meat and vegetarian, around 20 euros pp. Comes all at once in little dishes. Quite nice to try a bit if everything, and filling.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: I was very excited to try this place. Unfortunately, this review will NOT tell you about the food. ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Just had diner over there. We had a combination of various dishes (you can't order anything else)  One spoiled dish, that can happen, but they took it back and the only thing they said was: do you want something else instead of that.... no ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text:
We ordered rice table and everything was tasting great. Service was a bit slow, we ate our food halfway and drinks were still not served.
After paying tge bill we went out for a walk around the neighbourhood before ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: I've never had rice table before because it's not available where I come from, so I don't have a compare it to, but I have been excited to try it and I thought it was fantastic. Also the staff were very friendly. Wonderful experience.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: We wanted to eat some Indonesian food, and this place offered a vegetarian rijstafel  plate for two. It was really tasty, and the atmosphere was really warm and cosy. I would definitely eat here again.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: If you are cravings for Asian food, this is a must try. Had great time here. Food is awesome, service is great. Staff are very friendly. Environment is great.. They are doing a great job here.. keep it up!!

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Visit this Indonesian restaurant every time I visit Amsterdam. Always good food and busy location, with reasonable pricing. Would recommend trying a Rijsttafel to try lots of different flavours

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Amazing food, both the taste and presentation.  Service was a bit slow (and very friendly) but it could have been that it was a fairly busy night in the restaurant.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: THE FOOD IS SOOO GOOD HERE!!! It‚Äôs a must go in my opinion. The staff is also very friendly. This place deserves more than 5 stars üëçüëçüëç

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: If you're asian or if you've ever had proper Indonesian food in Indonesia or want too in the future, avoid this place like the plague. Everything's watered down and flavours changed to what I can only guess is for "local/western" tastes. ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Horrible tourist trap! The Reistafel has no distinct flavors at all. Worst one I ever had.  They served the 5 of us the same amount of food as for tables of 2 - but charged for 5!

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Fabulous authentic Indonesian food, just as my mum and gran would cook it! Lovely friendly service and all for a great price.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: I wish I could give more rating because the food was actually good. The service was so slow and although there were plenty tables available, we couldn't sit because no one was available to clear the tables. They seem to be short staffed and ‚Ä¶

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: We had the Aneka rijsttafel and it was one of the best meals we've ever had. The restaurant was comfy and the hosts could not have been more welcoming.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Rice-table was excellent, everything tasty.  Too much to eat for 2 people.   Don't fill up on the chips and peanut sauce before the mail.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: We had a rice table. Two kinds of rice with many small meat, chicken and vegeterian dishes. Some of them were good. The others were ok. The service was great.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Really good food, super service and they definitely made me a regular. Especially in these hard times!

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: I should have rated this restaurant with 3 stars because of the totally unfriendly staff,but the food is tasty,and the atmosphere is cool...I generally aim to be generous and flexible with the feedbacks so everyone can work on themselves and become better by the ratings.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Very delicious and authentic food. After having  stayed many years in Malaysia, I can say the ricetable was perfect!

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: The food was terrific and I loved the rice table which has a mix of their greatest hits. The location is next to the seedy Red Light Distric so keep that in mind if you are with children.

Name: Aneka Rasa
Review Text: Banging food for a very good price and lovely staff! Thanks guys for the deliciousness. Highly reccomend

Name: Aneka Rasa

Name: Aneka Rasa
